name: Violet and the Lost Colors
description:
On the day of their first meeting that smells like roses and violets, Violet the Forest Witch falls in love with Princess Honora at first sight.
On that same day, a mysterious traveler tells the witch about a tragedy that befalls the princess. 

The seven colors of the rainbow melt away from the princess' body and fly around like fireflies. They vanish deep inside the woods separately, leaving the poor princess turning monochrome.
It's now up to Violet to retrieve the lost colors back for the beloved princess!

Violet and the Lost Colors is a turn-based RPG Maker adventure game where you get to wander the depth of the forest as a witch to gather all the seven colors the princess has lost. It is developed from a simple thought of a strange fairy tale, where the protagonist has always been familiar with magic yet discovered something stranger than magic.

My very first game that is made with RPG Maker MV within 2 months and a half for the Yuri Game Jam 2021, my very first jam!

FEATURES 

● Turn-based combat with random encounter. Encounter the wild forest creatures hiding in the patches of grasses!

● You get to transform into a cat! Human form and cat form each have different abilities!

● Complete NPCs' side quests to receive rewards, information, or a new skill!  Or just chat with the other NPCs that don't give you tasks.

● Gather the information of the forest creatures you will encounter during your journey to learn new skills!

● Brew potions to be used in battle!

● Dancing mushrooms!

● 2 bosses + 1 final boss 

● One happily ever after(?)

Controls are listed in the README txt file in the game's folder
